code: import firebase from'../firebase.js';var storeUserInDatabase=function storeUserInDatabase(id){var user={name:'Jo Bamba',age:22,bio:'Click edit to edit your bio!',skillsToTeach:['sports'],skillsToLearn:['cooking']};firebase.database().ref('users').child(id).set(user);};export var createUser=function createUser(email,password){firebase.auth().createUserWithEmailAndPassword(email,password).then(function(){return firebase.auth().currentUser.uid;}).then(function(uid){storeUserInDatabase(uid);}).catch(function(ignore){});};export var signInUser=function signInUser(email,password){firebase.auth().signInWithEmailAndPassword(email,password).then(function(){return firebase.auth().currentUser.uid;}).then(function(uid){return uid;}).catch(function(ignore){});};export var signOutUser=function signOutUser(){firebase.auth().signOut().then(function(){}).catch(function(ignore){});};
